snippet: Kolbjorn Kristiansen was waiting for an elevator at Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport when airport police officers and a Transportation Security Administration agent "detected the odor of a consumed alcohol beverage," according to arrest...
abstract: Kolbjorn Kristiansen was waiting for an elevator at Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport when airport police officers and a Transportation Security Administration agent "detected the odor of a consumed alcohol beverage," according to arrest papers.

headline.main: La Guardia-Bound Pilot Arrested on Alcohol Charge
